title: Can't gift emotes
body: Why hasn't riot introduced gifting emotes for friends yet, literally unplayable...

replies.body: The emote system, in general, is still a bit new right now but I'm sure they'll have stuff like that figured out with time. I haven't personally heard anything regarding a timeline for that, but at least you can gift that person RP and they could buy the emote they want that way ^_^!
